SELECT B_ID as bId, B_CATEGORY as bCategory, B_CC as bCc, B_TITLE as bTitle, B_CONTENT as bContent, B_CREATED_ID as bCreatedId, U_NICKNAME as bWriter, B_CREATED_DATE as bCreatedDate, B_UPDATED_ID as bUpdatedId, B_UPDATED_DATE as bUpdatedDate, B_VIEWS as bViews FROM BOARD b LEFT JOIN BOB_USER u ON B_CREATED_ID = U_ID WHERE
B_ID = #{keyword}
(B_CATEGORY = #{keyword} OR B_CATEGORY IN ( SELECT CASE WHEN #{keyword} = '정비' THEN 'R' WHEN #{keyword} = '꿀팁' THEN 'T' WHEN #{keyword} = '코스' THEN 'C' WHEN #{keyword} = '자유' THEN 'F' END FROM DUAL ))
(B_CC = #{keyword} OR B_CC IN ( SELECT CASE WHEN #{keyword} = '스쿠터' THEN 'S' WHEN #{keyword} = '소형' THEN 'SM' WHEN #{keyword} = '중형' THEN 'M' WHEN #{keyword} = '리터' THEN 'L' END FROM DUAL ))
B_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
u.U_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY B_CREATED_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( B_ID, B_CATEGORY , B_CC , B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_CREATED_ID, B_CREATED_DATE, B_VIEWS ) VALUES ( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bCategory}, #{bCc}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, #{bCreatedId}, SYSDATE, #{bViews})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET B_TITLE = #{bTitle}, B_CONTENT = #{bContent}, B_CATEGORY = #{bCategory}, B_CC = #{bCc}, B_UPDATED_ID = #{bCreatedId}, B_UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE B_ID = #{bId}
